title: Palatial Seaside Sussex Stay with Award-Winning Dining, Spa & Outdoor Pool
description: Known locally as The White Palace, The Grand Hotel Eastbourne is one of the most glamorous hotels in Sussex. The palatial hotel, with sparkling sea views and the cliffs at Beachy Head to the right, boasts a dedicated health club, spa and two pools, offering the ultimate in seaside serenity. Two of Eastbourne's most acclaimed restaurants reside within the hotel's walls - dine at the award-winning Mirabelle or savour afternoon tea and sip cocktails in the Great Hall.
offer_address: King Edward's Parade, Eastbourne, Sussex BN21 4EQ, United Kingdom
